job_tasks.phrase: Work with product owners and curators to understand requirements and guide new features
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes traditional software engineering tasks focused on understanding business needs and guiding the development of new features, aligning with the definition of integrating software into applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate to identify new feature impacts on existing services and teams
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding how new features affect the existing software ecosystem and teams, which is a core aspect of software integration and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: Research, prototype, and select appropriate COTS and in-house technology and design
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of evaluating and choosing technologies for software development, a fundamental software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with team to design, develop, and occasionally enhance or maintain existing systems
job_tasks.justification: This directly maps to the definition of designing, developing, testing, maintaining, and deploying software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: Document designs and implementation to ensure consistency and alignment with standards
job_tasks.justification: Documenting designs and implementations is a standard software engineering practice for ensuring consistency and maintainability.

job_tasks.phrase: Create documentation including system and sequence diagrams
job_tasks.justification: Creating system and sequence diagrams is a specific form of documentation crucial for software design and understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Create appropriate data pipelines for AI / ML
job_tasks.justification: This task involves building data pipelines specifically for AI/ML, which falls under the data engineering aspect of preparing data for models.

job_tasks.phrase: Utilize and apply generative AI for products and for daily productivity
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the use and application of generative AI, which is a core task within GenAI specialization.

job_tasks.phrase: Periodically explore new technologies and design patterns with proof-of-concept
job_tasks.justification: Exploring new technologies and creating proof-of-concepts is part of the research and development cycle in software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Occasionally present research and work to socialize and share knowledge across the organization
job_tasks.justification: Presenting research and sharing knowledge is a clear example of communication and collaboration within an organization.

profile.rationale: The job ad heavily emphasizes traditional software engineering tasks (design, development, integration, documentation, pipelines) under Macro-Category A. While it mentions utilizing generative AI (LLMs, RAG, Agents) and creating data pipelines for AI/ML, these are presented as features to be integrated into existing systems or as supporting tasks rather than the primary focus of model development or deep AI research. The role is described as a 'Full Stack Software Engineer - AI', indicating that AI is an augmentation to a core software engineering role. The balance leans significantly towards Macro-Category A, with specific AI/GenAI tasks falling under Macro-Category B but not dominating the description. Therefore, 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' is the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and detailed, explicitly listing a wide range of software engineering responsibilities alongside specific AI/GenAI technologies and tasks. The title 'Full Stack Software Engineer - AI' also provides strong context. This clarity allows for a confident classification of tasks and technologies, leading to a well-supported profile assignment.
